U - type of the users
All Implemented Interfaces:
es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.novdiv.reranking.Reranker<U,​U>
public class ProgressiveDirectEdgeMetricReranker<U>
extends EdgeMetricReranker<U>
Reranker that optimizes the average value of an edge metric. The value of the metric is updated each time we choose an edge to recommend. Individually reranks each recommendation.
Author:
Javier Sanz-Cruzado (javier.sanz-cruzado@uam.es), Pablo Castells (pablo.castells@uam.es)

      public ProgressiveDirectEdgeMetricReranker​(double lambda, int cutoff, java.util.function.Supplier<Normalizer<U>> norm, Graph<U> graph, PairMetric<U> metric)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      lambda - trade-off between the recommendation score and the novelty/diversity value.
      cutoff - number of elements to take.
      norm - the normalization strategy.
      graph - the original graph.
      metric - the metric to optimize.
